basics.name: Er Sin Cher
basics.title: Senior UI/UX Designer
basics.summary: Experienced Senior UI/UX Designer with over 10 years of expertise in creating user-centered interfaces and design systems. Proven track record in leading design teams, implementing analytics solutions, and developing scalable design systems across various industries.

Automated Google Sheets for data threshold monitoring and notifications
